info.title: Persons
info.description: Persons Resource of the University API

get.description: Returns a collection of Persons

parameters.name: credential_type
parameters.description: The type of credential being looked up

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: The user name belonging to the credential type

parameters.name: ssn
parameters.description: The person's Social Security Number, no dashes

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: The person's PERSONAL email address. A case-insensitive search is performed.  A wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The person's phone number.  A numerics-only search is performed.

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: The person's surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.  You may insert '*' wildcards anywhere in the string, and a wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: rest_of_name
parameters.description: The person's given names.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_surname
parameters.description: The person's preferred surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_first_name
parameters.description: The person's preferred first name.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: religion_code
parameters.description: The person's religion, validated through the meta/religion service

parameters.name: citizenship_country_code
parameters.description: The person's citizenship, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: home_state_code
parameters.description: The person's home state, validated through the meta/state service

parameters.name: home_country_code
parameters.description: The person's home country code, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: visa_type
parameters.description: The person's visa type, validated through the meta/visa_type service

parameters.name: employee_type
parameters.description: The person's employee type in XXX-XX-XXX format. (See the meta/employee_type service)

parameters.name: student_status
parameters.description: The person's student status.  Provided by Student Status Info service

parameters.name: field_sets
parameters.description: indicates which field sets are to be returned

parameters.name: contexts
parameters.description: indicates which contexts are to be returned

200.description: A collection of Persons successfully returned

parameters.name: person_post
parameters.description: The address values to be set

get.description: Returns the person with the specified BYU ID

parameters.name: field_sets
parameters.description: indicates which field sets are to be returned

parameters.name: contexts
parameters.description: indicates which contexts are to be returned

put.description: Modifies the Person with specified BYU ID

parameters.name: basic_put
parameters.description: The person data to be updated

delete.description: Deletes the person with the specified BYU ID

get.description: Returns all addresses for the BYU ID
Returns the address for the specified BYU ID and address type

put.description: Modifies or creates an address for the specified BYU ID and address_type

parameters.name: address_put
parameters.description: The address values to be set

delete.description: Deletes the address for the BYU ID/address_type

get.description: Returns all alias domains for the BYU ID
Returns the attributes for an individual email alias domain

200.description: The email address was successfully returned

put.description: Modifies or creates an alias domain for the BYU ID

parameters.name: alias_domain_put
parameters.description: The email address values to be set

delete.description: Deletes the alias domain for the BYU ID

get.description: Returns all credentials for the BYU ID

parameters.name: credential_type
parameters.description: One of the credential types available through the meta/credential_type service.

parameters.name: credential_type
parameters.description: One of the credential types available through the meta/credential_type service.

parameters.description: One of the credential types available through the meta/credential_type service.

parameters.name: credential_put
parameters.description: The attributes of the credential to be created or updated

parameters.description: One of the credential types available through the meta/credential_type service.

parameters.name: credential_id
parameters.description: One of the credential types available through the meta/credential_type service.

post.description: Modifies or creates an address for the specified BYU ID and address_type

parameters.name: delegated_operation_performed_post
parameters.description: The operation values to be set

parameters.description: The forwarding email address for the given alias

Returns group membership information for the BYU ID/group

200.description: The groups administered by the person successfully returned

200.description: Person's ID card information successfully returned

parameters.description: The ID card info being changed

204.description: Person's ID card information successfully deleted

get.description: Returns the languages for a person
Returns a person's abilities for a specific language

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: One of the language codes available through the meta/language service

200.description: The persons language ability successfully returned

put.description: Modifies a person's abilities for a specific language

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: One of the language codes available through the meta/language service

parameters.name: language_put
parameters.description: The language parameters to be created

200.description: Language information successfully updated for the person/language

delete.description: Deletes a person's language abilities for a specific language

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: One of the language codes available through the meta/language service

get.description: Returns a collection of guest rights delegator to the BYU ID
Returns the guest rights delegator to the BYU ID by the delegator BYU ID

parameters.name: byu_id
parameters.description: The BYU ID of the person (guest)

put.description: Accepts or rejects the access delegation invitation

parameters.name: my_delegator_put
parameters.description: The details of the rights being granted.

get.description: Returns a collection of guests who have or had access rights to this BYU_ID

200.description: Guest Access rights granted by a BYU ID successfully returned

post.description: Creates guest access information for the person/guest

parameters.name: my_guest_put
parameters.description: The guest access information to be set

201.description: Guest access information for successfully created

get.description: Returns a specific access delegation and information about to whom it was granted. NOTE: Guest ID is not used because the same person could have been granted access then had access revoked and then granted access again

200.description: The guest access information for the person/guest successfully returned

put.description: Modifies guest access information for the person/guest

parameters.name: my_guest_put
parameters.description: The guest access information to be set

200.description: Guest access information for successfully updated

links.description: Hypermedia links for an address

building.description: The building code, validated through the meta/building service, set only for a BYU office

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of addresses
Hypermedia links for an alias domains

limit.description: The domain of the email alias

quantity.description: The number of aliases that are currently using this domain

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of email addresses
Hypermedia links for basic person information

deceased.description: Whether or not the person is deceased

suffix.description: The suffix, validated through the meta/suffix service

value.description: Generational suffix for name: Roman Numeral, JR, SR, Jr, or Sr

preferred_first_name.description: The preferred first name of the person

preferred_surname.description: The preferred last name of the user

rest_of_name.description: The person's complete name, excluding the surname

name_lnf.description: The last-name-first form of the name, consisting of surname, comma, blank, rest_of_name

name_fnf.description: The first-name-first form of the name, consisting of rest_of_name, blank, surname

preferred_name.description: The person's preferred name, consisting of the preferred_first_name and preferred_surname

home_state_code.description: The home state or province, validated through the meta/state service

home_country_code.description: The home country code, validated through the meta/country service

high_school_code.description: Code indicating the person's high school

high_school_city.description: The city the high school is located inside

high_school_state_code.description: The state code that the high school is located inside

restricted.description: Indicates the restricted status, as defined by FERPA

merge_in_process.description: Indicates whether a merge is pending for this record, in which case updates are not allowed

basic_put.description: Basic person information to be updated

suffix.description: Generational suffix for name: Roman Numeral, JR, SR, Jr, or Sr

cache.description: If data is from live source, value will be null, otherwise it will be date-time of cache

created_by_id.description: The BYU ID of the person who performed the creation

links.description: Hypermedia links for a credential

status.description: The credential status, validated through the meta/credential_status service

physical_form.description: The Credential and Issue Number of associated physical form

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of credentials

date_time_created.description: The date/time when the entity was created, given in GMT (Greenwich Mean Time)

date_time_inactivated.description: The date/time the group or group membership was de-activated

date_time_updated.description: The most recent date/time updated, given in GMT (Greenwich Mean Time)

effective_date.description: The date the permissions become (or became) active

400.description: Invalid Request - unable to interpret request
